preview.sampleDataActive: You're viewing sample data. This is how your analytics will look once you have real data.

engagements.title: Engagement Analytics Preview
engagements.description: Track engagement activity, trends, and outcomes across your organization
engagements.insight1: See engagement trends over time to identify peak activity periods
engagements.insight2: Analyze engagement types to understand communication preferences
engagements.insight3: Track outcomes to measure engagement effectiveness

relationships.title: Relationship Health Preview
relationships.description: Monitor relationship health scores and identify areas needing attention
relationships.insight1: View health distribution to prioritize relationship maintenance
relationships.insight2: Track score trends to identify improving or declining relationships
relationships.insight3: Get alerts for critical relationships that need immediate attention

commitments.title: Commitment Tracking Preview
commitments.description: Monitor commitment fulfillment rates and delivery performance
commitments.insight1: Track fulfillment rates to ensure promises are kept
commitments.insight2: Identify overdue commitments before they become critical
commitments.insight3: Analyze completion trends by source (meetings, tasks, intake)

workload.title: Workload Distribution Preview
workload.description: Analyze team workload balance and identify capacity issues
workload.insight1: Identify overloaded team members to prevent burnout
workload.insight2: Balance work distribution across your team
workload.insight3: Track priority distribution to ensure urgent items get attention

overview.title: Analytics Overview Preview
overview.description: Get a comprehensive view of all key metrics in one place
overview.insight1: See all critical metrics at a glance
overview.insight2: Identify trends across engagements, relationships, and commitments
overview.insight3: Access detailed analytics with one click
